# IST repository
This repository contains all scripts necessary to setup and evaluate an Incremental Step Test (IST). 

*IST_generator.py can be used to create machine readable programs for the IST.
![Screenshot of a generated IST program](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/94892196/386638255-d5c6abaf-0917-4730-a4c7-afcf286d1a3e.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..s7M9zId6OH_H0janQvGp4f_Q4DY5tbVwNFIDDGU79u4)
